== TypeOracle classes ==

  * Generated class "com.gwtent.reflection.client.TypeOracle_Visitor" 
    # All class declares will created reflection information in your project
    # All annotation implement classes(not the annotation reflection)

  * Under package "com.gwtent.reflection.client"
    # All annotation and class comes from java.* and javax.* are put under this package to avoid 

  All reflection of individual class are created under the same package of it, the generated class are end with "__Reflection"
  
  For example "com.gwtent.client.test.reflection.TestReflection"
